name: SwaraRadio
0:
”Alexa, open swara radio”
”Alexa, start swara radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: swara radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Though ‘Smart’ is the new normal in the current art technology, we often hear people being nostalgic as they retrospect their days of listening to the radio. Listening without any visual distraction in no way can be underrated in developing distinct perception and imagination. 

Swara Radio Skill airs 
• live events 
• hosts talk shows with experts and celebrities 
• Info-western music for every mood and occasion—from spiritual mornings to soothing afternoons to jazzy evenings.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
